description: Try our easy to follow Curried Prawn Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Curried Prawn Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the filling onto the pancakes, and either roll or fold into four. Serve with a squeeze of lemon.
